body:
Hello @TomAugspurger! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/api/extensions/__init__.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/98ac0471080f397f163eb809fefc8909e02db1cb/pandas/api/extensions/__init__.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/dtypes/dtypes.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/98ac0471080f397f163eb809fefc8909e02db1cb/pandas/core/dtypes/dtypes.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/extension/base/dtype.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/98ac0471080f397f163eb809fefc8909e02db1cb/pandas/tests/extension/base/dtype.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/extension/decimal/test_decimal.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/98ac0471080f397f163eb809fefc8909e02db1cb/pandas/tests/extension/decimal/test_decimal.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/extension/json/test_json.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/98ac0471080f397f163eb809fefc8909e02db1cb/pandas/tests/extension/json/test_json.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/extension/test_categorical.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/98ac0471080f397f163eb809fefc8909e02db1cb/pandas/tests/extension/test_categorical.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/extension/test_integer.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/98ac0471080f397f163eb809fefc8909e02db1cb/pandas/tests/extension/test_integer.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/extension/test_interval.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/98ac0471080f397f163eb809fefc8909e02db1cb/pandas/tests/extension/test_interval.py) !
also can you change the registration of the pandas EA types to use the new register function (e.g. Categorical, Interval etc)

Updated for categorical and interval. Couldn't do the same for the various Integer dtypes, since they're generated dynamically.

> Couldn't do the same for the various Integer dtypes, since they're generated dynamically.

https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/master/pandas/core/arrays/integer.py#L621

just a 1-liner to change
All green (this was split from the SparseArray PR fyi. I think I have one or two more things to split before)

lgtm

though i think should re-evaluate the test (could be that wasn’t testing anything), but this should have a test
